ygData.subject: Re: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Well if he did, o well.  I really really like my lambent look as it is, especially with my guise and I put A LOT of blood and sweat into getting it. I don t
ygData.messageBody:
Well if he did, o well. I really really like my lambent look as it is,
especially with my guise and I put A LOT of blood and sweat into getting it.
I don't want to trade it away unless I'm really really getting something
much better in return. On the other hand, I have a Basalt Carapace, Chipped
Bone Bracelet, Griffeene charm, icy greeves, shin greeves, fiery vambraces,
firewalker boots, the 2 runes off the brother cyclops's and a lambent stone
in the bank...

Wish I had a lute, then this would be a no brainer. God I hate MM.

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 35th song
Prexus

----- Original Message -----
From: <John_Senior@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 10:20 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Trading Advice


> From: John_Senior@...
>
> I hope so for your sake, but remember there are loads of bards with
Lambent
> so it's not a surprise if this wizard has traded with someone else.
>
>
>
>

>
> Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

>

> Haven't lost out on the chance yet :-)
>
